title: Ketu Transit in the 9th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your ninth house brings detachment from rigid belief systems, external guidance, and inherited philosophies. You may question teachers, traditions, or long-held principles, seeking truth through personal experience rather than doctrine. Travel for meaning may reduce, while inner exploration increases. This phase reshapes faith into something quieter and self-realized. When embraced consciously, Ketu here deepens spiritual maturity, removes blind belief, and aligns you with a more authentic inner compass.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Respect grows through independence of thought.
Distance from teachers or elders possible.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Spending on travel or education reduces.

closing: Ketu in the 9th house strips belief of dogma. What remains is truth discovered through lived experience.
